channel.title: Mac Release Of Retail Version
channel.description: Hello Dev Team, now that the early access is released, I would like to know if there would be a Mac/Linux release?

item.title: Mac Release Of Retail Version
item.dc:creator: NoriMori
item.description:
Fr0z3n:

We have an internal Mac and Linux build that we’re working on.

Even just that is music to my ears.

Read full topic

item.title: Mac Release Of Retail Version
item.dc:creator: Fr0z3n
item.description:
We have an internal Mac and Linux build that we’re working on. We dont’ have a timeline for release though.

Read full topic

item.title: Mac Release Of Retail Version
item.dc:creator: SquidThePrinter
item.description:
I’d assume its like it said on the forums for the (now) legacy version: they have no plans to do it because it is difficult, but if you can do it then by all means, go for it.

But don’t take my word for it. I use both Mac and PC so having both versions would be great, but I can settle for the better PC version. In any way, if you’re a Mac only user, I feel you. I hated not having a PC to play awesome games on.

…but it would be really cool for a Mac version . Just don’t get your hopes up.

Read full topic
